taskDescription: Draw a skeletal structure of the following carbocation. Identify it as primary, secondary, or tertiary, and identify the hydrogen atoms that have the proper orientation for hyperconjugation in the conformation shown.
detailedSolution: In the conformation shown, only the methyl- group C−H that is parallel to the carbocation p orbital can show hyperconjugation.
